titles.title: For the relief of Sophonie Telcy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/4/2000--Introduced. Declares a named individual to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act. Prohibits such individual from being regarded as seeking an admission into the United States under the immigration laws if she is absent from the United States for any period by reason of having traveled to Haiti.
